mapper.select: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN pt.point_stat = 1 THEN ot.od_sell_price * 0.01 ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN pt.point_stat IN (0, 2) THEN pt.od_use_point ELSE 0 END) AS SIGNED) AS point_calu FROM point_tb pt JOIN od_tb ot ON pt.od_id = ot.od_id WHERE pt.user_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cp_user_tb cut WHERE use_stat = 1 AND user_id = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE user_tb SET user_stts = 0, user_wdate = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
